Body:
Description: Dear Team,

One of our customers recently purchased the DLP 1001 license. We have successfully configured the Device Control and Content Aware Policy as per the customer's requirements.

However, we have a few queries regarding the features and require further assistance to ensure optimal configuration and usage.

Kindly arrange a remote session with your support team to help us address the queries and provide the necessary clarifications or adjustments.

Regards
Gopinath
